common_errors.cause: File is not a valid ar archive
common_errors.solution: Verify file is archive: file libfoo.a. Create proper archive with ar first.
Verify path. Create archive first: ar rcs libfoo.a *.o

common_errors.cause: Cannot read or modify archive file
Archive contains no symbols (objects may be stripped or empty)
common_errors.solution: Archive will work but won't benefit from index. Rebuild objects without stripping.

common_errors.cause: ranlib didn't run successfully or archive modified after ranlib
common_errors.solution: Run ranlib again: ranlib libfoo.a (or ar s libfoo.a)

common_errors.cause: Not a valid archive format for this platform
common_errors.solution: Check archive was created for correct platform. May need cross-platform ranlib.
Check ranlib --help. Most ranlib implementations take just archive name.

common_errors.cause: File cannot be opened (doesn't exist, permissions, in use)
common_errors.solution: Verify file exists and is readable. Close other programs using it.

common_errors.cause: Failed to write updated archive (disk full, permissions)
common_errors.solution: Check disk space: df -h. Check directory permissions.
